strategy: Deathwatch armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: Planetary Defence Force formations have an Initiative of 2+. All other formations have an Initiative of 1+
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on Ordo Xenos with Deathwatch allies

formations.name: 0-1 Officio Assassinorum
formations.units: Once per battle, during an Assault that the Deathwatch player initiated, a single unit anywhere in the enemy formation(s) is hit with D3 hits. These hits counts as being from CC, and have the 'Sniper' and 'First Strike' special rules.

formations.name: 0-1 Ordo Xenos Inquisitor Retinue
formations.units: One Inquisitor, five Ordo Xenos Acolytes, three Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace three Rhinos with two Land Raider Crusaders: 100 points
Replace three Rhinos with three Land Raiders: 150 points

formations.name: Deathwatch Kill-Team
extraUnits: Replace two Deathwatch Tacticals with Deathwatch Devastators: 50 points

sections.name: Deathwatch Support Detachments
sections.description: One Deathwatch Support Detachment may be fielded per Deathwatch Core Detachment

formations.name: Deathwatch Terminators
extraUnits: Add one Land Raider Crusader (50 points) or two Land Raiders (100 points)

formations.name: Deathwatch Vanguard
formations.units: Three Land Speeder Tornado, three Assault Bikes
extraUnits: Replace up to three Assault Bikes with Attack Bikes: Free

sections.name: Planetary Defense Force Formations
sections.description: Two Planetary Defense Force Formations may be fielded per Deathwatch Core Detachment

formations.name: Adeptus Arbites Suppression Platoon
formations.units: Six Adeptus Arbites, three Arbites Repressors

formations.name: Adeptus Arbites Interdiction Platoon
formations.units: Three Adeptus Arbites Combat Bikes, three Cyber Mastiffs

formations.name: Motorized Planetary Defense Platoon
formations.units: Six PDF Conscripts, three PDF Land Transporters

sections.name: Deathwatch Navy Detachments
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on Deathwatch Navy Detachments

upgrades.title: Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: Commander
items.description: Add a Captain, Chaplain or Librarian

options.description: Replace the Watch Sergeant with a Watch Master (Death Watch Detachments only. May not be combined with the 'Commander' upgrade)
Replace the Inquisitor and its unit with an Inquisitor Lord (Ordo Xenos Inquisitor Retinue only)
